original_text: Then Menahem the son of Gadi came up from Tirzah and came to Samaria, and he struck down Shallum the son of Jabesh in Samaria and put him to death and reigned in his place.
korean_text: 가디의 아들 므나헴이 디르사에서부터 사마리아로 올라가서 야베스의 아들 살룸을 거기에서 쳐죽이고 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Then Menahem the son of Gadi came up from Tirzah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 가디의 아들 므나헴이 디르사에서 올라와

sentences.original_text: and he struck down Shallum the son of Jabesh
